content: Giacomo Verticale Skip to content Giacomo Verticale Home Available Theses Bio Projects Publications Teaching Contacts Languages Quantum Communications Class Posted on 02/02/2019 by 10169800@polimi.it Starting this year, we offer a Quantum Communications class. The official teacher is prof. Mario Martinelli, and the class also features seminars by other teachers, including myself. Get the calendar and an abstract of the course. Posted in Uncategorized | Leave a comment Cryptowars 2018 Posted on 02/10/2018 by 10169800@polimi.it Aprono oggi le iscrizioni per la Cryptowars italiana 2018. La competizione è aperta a team studenteschi composti da un massimo di 5 studenti. Termine iscrizioni 10 ottobre, l’evento si svolgerà dal 15 al 21 ottobre. Informazioni qui: http://club.di.unimi.it/activities.html Posted in Uncategorized | Leave a comment Thesis proposals updated Posted on 21/03/2018 by 10169800@polimi.it Please visit the thesis proposal page.
